extendedInfo.description: It's a fast-pace and super addictive time killer with funny characters and fantastic multi-layered backdrops. Tilt your phone to collect coins, grab power ups, and dodge monsters.**ATTENTION**Install and launch "Pack for Hyper Jump" to unleash more scenes and characters

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: Used to work on gnex. Then update caused error. I\'m sure fix will come soon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t load
reviews.comment: Force closes on opening every time. Annoying. 1 star camel toe games
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game freezes a lot
reviews.comment: After the update, lost my score results and it has started freezing a lot while playing it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice graphics & fun 4 a moment.
reviews.comment: Note: The dev\'s description gives wrong name... Search in market for \"Hyper Jump resources pack\". Sadly, I find this repetitive & boring. It basically just seems to involve restarting the same jump over &  over, in order to improve on the last attempt. Little opportunity to utilise skills, techniques or strategies.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: I normally hate this style game because it ends quickly when i\'m playing. This game has great additions to keep it fun and longer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes during game start
reviews.comment: The game no longer works.   It crashes during start up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t buy, crashes on open
reviews.comment: Don\'t know if everyone has this problem but I have the gnex and the game crashes on open, even after reinstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good to kill a min or two
reviews.comment: Runs really well on less beefy phones.
reviews.author: Paul Leeder

reviews.title: Is skill required?
reviews.comment: I must be missing something. Game seems to involve zero skill... Just a series of power-ups.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Time Waster
reviews.comment: A great way waste time, very addictive and frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What the F-
reviews.comment: Last update erased my high score! All my hard work down the toilet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Jelly Bean 4.2+
reviews.comment: I used to love this game but it hasn\'t been updated to with with 4.2 and above.
reviews.author: Pudge Holden

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: Love this game... But the update erased all of my game data. High scores, settings, everything. Unbelievable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hard to maneuver, graphics could be crisper. Mega jump is way better, and it\'s free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very poor support
reviews.comment: HTC sensation , crash all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: gnex users turn off force GPU rendering and it will work again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What a hell!
reviews.comment: Updating this version delete all my high score. My top score about 14000 has gone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updates?
reviews.comment: I enjoy the game, it\'s ok. But since I downloaded the game there hasn\'t been any updates. Is there anyone behind this game?
reviews.author: Dester Medina

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This game is really fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problem with accelerometer resolved
reviews.comment: Now working as should on TF101 with update applied 20/12-2011
reviews.author: A Google User
